comments.author: jorendorff@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jorendorff@mozilla.com
comments.text:
If a debugging hook throws an exception and the uncaughtExceptionHook is null, or it also throws an error, we don't do what the spec says:

https://wiki.mozilla.org/Debugger#Accessor_Properties_of_the_Debugger_Prototype_Object
comments.raw_text:
If a debugging hook throws an exception and the uncaughtExceptionHook is null, or it also throws an error, we don't do what the spec says:

https://wiki.mozilla.org/Debugger#Accessor_Properties_of_the_Debugger_Prototype_Object
